sn42.13:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava koliyesu viharati uttaram nama koliyanam nigamo.
sn42.13:1.2: Atha kho pataliyo gamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho pataliyo gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.13:2.1: Ye te, bhante, evamahamsu: ‘samano gotamo mayam janati’ti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavadino, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkhanti, dhammassa canudhammam byakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati?
sn42.13:2.3: “Ye te, gamani, evamahamsu: ‘samano gotamo mayam janati’ti, vuttavadino ceva me, te na ca mam abhutena abbhacikkhanti, dhammassa canudhammam byakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati”ti.
sn42.13:2.4: “Saccamyeva kira, bho, mayam tesam samanabrahmananam na saddahama:
sn42.13:2.5: ‘samano gotamo mayam janati’ti, samano khalu bho gotamo mayavi”ti.
sn42.13:2.6: “Yo nu kho, gamani, evam vadeti: ‘aham mayam janami’ti, so evam vadeti: ‘aham mayavi’”ti.
sn42.13:2.7: “Tatheva tam bhagava hoti, tatheva tam sugata hoti”ti.
sn42.13:2.8: “Tena hi, gamani, tannevettha patipucchissami; yatha te khameyya, tatha tam byakareyyasi—
sn42.13:3.4: “Tam kim mannasi, gamani, kimatthiya koliyanam lambaculaka bhata”ti?
sn42.13:3.5: “Ye ca, bhante, koliyanam cora te ca patisedhetum, yani ca koliyanam duteyyani tani ca vahatum, etadatthiya, bhante, koliyanam lambaculaka bhata”ti.
sn42.13:3.7: janasi tvam koliyanam lambaculake bhate silavante va te dussile va”ti?
sn42.13:3.8: “Janamaham, bhante, koliyanam lambaculake bhate dussile papadhamme; ye ca loke dussila papadhamma koliyanam lambaculaka bhata tesam annatara”ti.
sn42.13:3.10: ‘pataliyo gamani janati koliyanam lambaculake bhate dussile papadhamme, pataliyopi gamani dussilo papadhammo’ti, samma nu kho so vadamano vadeyya”ti?
sn42.13:3.12: Anne, bhante, koliyanam lambaculaka bhata, annohamasmi. Annathadhamma koliyanam lambaculaka bhata, annathadhammohamasmi”ti.
sn42.13:3.13: “Tvanhi nama, gamani, lacchasi: ‘pataliyo gamani janati koliyanam lambaculake bhate dussile papadhamme, na ca pataliyo gamani dussilo papadhammo’ti, kasma tathagato na lacchati: ‘tathagato mayam janati, na ca tathagato mayavi’ti?
sn42.13:3.14: Mayancaham, gamani, pajanami, mayaya ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca mayavi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.1: Panatipatancaham, gamani, pajanami, panatipatassa ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca panatipati kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.2: Adinnadanancaham, gamani, pajanami, adinnadanassa ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca adinnadayi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.3: Kamesumicchacarancaham, gamani, pajanami, kamesumicchacarassa ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca kamesumicchacari kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.4: Musavadancaham, gamani, pajanami, musavadassa ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca musavadi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.5: Pisunavacancaham, gamani, pajanami, pisunavacaya ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca pisunavaco kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.6: Pharusavacancaham, gamani, pajanami, pharusavacaya ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca pharusavaco kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.7: Samphappalapancaham, gamani, pajanami, samphappalapassa ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca samphappalapi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.8: Abhijjhancaham, gamani, pajanami, abhijjhaya ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca abhijjhalu kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.9: Byapadapadosancaham, gamani, pajanami, byapadapadosassa ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca byapannacitto kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:4.10: Micchaditthincaham, gamani, pajanami, micchaditthiya ca vipakam, yathapatipanno ca micchaditthiko kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
sn42.13:5.1: Santi hi, gamani, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
sn42.13:5.2: ‘yo koci panamatipateti, sabbo so dittheva dhamme dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn42.13:5.3: Yo koci adinnam adiyati, sabbo so dittheva dhamme dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn42.13:5.4: Yo koci kamesu miccha carati, sabbo so dittheva dhamme dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati.
sn42.13:5.5: Yo koci musa bhanati, sabbo so dittheva dhamme dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati’ti.
sn42.13:6.1: Dissati kho pana, gamani, idhekacco mali kundali sunhato suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikamehi raja manne paricarento.
sn42.13:6.3: ‘ambho, ayam puriso kim akasi mali kundali sunhato suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikamehi raja manne paricareti’ti?
sn42.13:6.5: ‘ambho, ayam puriso ranno paccatthikam pasayha jivita voropesi.
sn42.13:6.7: Tenayam puriso mali kundali sunhato suvilitto kappitakesamassu, itthikamehi raja manne paricareti’ti.
sn42.13:7.1: Dissati kho, gamani, idhekacco dalhaya rajjuya pacchabaham galhabandhanam bandhitva khuramundam karitva kharassarena panavena rathiyaya rathiyam singhatakena singhatakam parinetva, dakkhinena dvarena nikkhametva, dakkhinato nagarassa sisam chijjamano.
sn42.13:7.3: ‘ambho, ayam puriso kim akasi, dalhaya rajjuya pacchabaham galhabandhanam bandhitva khuramundam karitva kharassarena panavena rathiyaya rathiyam singhatakena singhatakam parinetva dakkhinena dvarena nikkhametva dakkhinato nagarassa sisam chindati’ti?
sn42.13:7.5: ‘ambho, ayam puriso rajaveri itthim va purisam va jivita voropesi,
sn42.13:7.6: tena nam rajano gahetva evarupam kammakaranam karenti’ti.
sn42.13:8.2: api nu te evarupam dittham va sutam va”ti?
sn42.13:8.4: “Tatra, gamani, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
sn42.13:8.5: ‘yo koci panamatipateti, sabbo so dittheva dhamme dukkham domanassam patisamvedayati’ti, saccam va te ahamsu musa va”ti?
sn42.13:8.7: “Ye pana te tuccham musa vilapanti, silavanto va te dussila va”ti?
sn42.13:8.9: “Ye pana te dussila papadhamma micchapatipanna va te sammapatipanna va”ti?
sn42.13:8.11: “Ye pana te micchapatipanna micchaditthika va te sammaditthika va”ti?
sn42.13:8.13: “Ye pana te micchaditthika kallam nu tesu pasiditun”ti?
sn42.13:9.1: “Dissati kho pana, gamani, idhekacco mali kundali …pe… itthikamehi raja manne paricarento.
sn42.13:9.3: ‘ambho, ayam puriso kim akasi mali kundali …pe… itthikamehi raja manne paricareti’ti?
sn42.13:9.5: ‘ambho, ayam puriso ranno paccatthikassa pasayha ratanam ahasi.

sn42.13:15.3: Tattha atthi mancakani, atthi asanani, atthi udakamaniko, atthi telappadipo.
sn42.13:15.4: Tattha yo samano va brahmano va vasam upeti, tenaham yathasatti yathabalam samvibhajami.
sn42.13:15.5: Bhutapubbam, bhante, cattaro sattharo nanaditthika nanakhantika nanarucika, tasmim avasathagare vasam upagacchum.
sn42.13:16.2: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako. Natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
sn42.13:17.2: ‘atthi dinnam, atthi yittham, atthi hutam, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, atthi ayam loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mata, atthi pita, atthi satta opapatika, atthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna, ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
sn42.13:18.2: ‘karoto karayato, chindato chedapayato, pacato pacapayato, socayato socapayato, kilamato kilamapayato, phandato phandapayato, panamatipatayato, adinnam adiyato, sandhim chindato, nillopam harato, ekagarikam karoto, paripanthe titthato, paradaram gacchato, musa bhanato, karoto na kariyati papam.
sn42.13:18.3: Khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissa pathaviya pane ekam mamsakhalam ekam mamsapunjam kareyya, natthi tatonidanam papam, natthi papassa agamo.
sn42.13:18.4: Dakkhinancepi gangaya tiram gaccheyya hananto ghatento chindanto chedapento pacanto pacapento, natthi tatonidanam papam, natthi papassa agamo.
sn42.13:18.5: Uttarancepi gangaya tiram gaccheyya dadanto dapento yajanto yajapento, natthi tatonidanam punnam, natthi punnassa agamo.
sn42.13:18.6: Danena damena samyamena saccavajjena natthi punnam, natthi punnassa agamo’ti.
sn42.13:19.2: ‘karoto karayato, chindato chedapayato, pacato pacapayato, socayato socapayato, kilamato kilamapayato, phandato phandapayato, panamatipatayato, adinnam adiyato, sandhim chindato, nillopam harato, ekagarikam karoto, paripanthe titthato, paradaram gacchato, musa bhanato, karoto kariyati papam.

sn42.13:20.1: Tassa mayham, bhante, ahudeva kankha, ahu vicikiccha:
sn42.13:20.2: ‘kosu nama imesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam aha, ko musa’”ti?
sn42.13:21.2: Kankhaniye ca pana te thane vicikiccha uppanna”ti.
sn42.13:21.3: “Evam pasannoham, bhante, bhagavati. Pahoti me bhagava tatha dhammam desetum yathaham imam kankhadhammam pajaheyyan”ti.
sn42.13:22.2: Tatra ce tvam cittasamadhim patilabheyyasi. Evam tvam imam kankhadhammam pajaheyyasi.
sn42.13:22.4: Idha, gamani, ariyasavako panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacaram pahaya kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato hoti, pisunam vacam pahaya pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti, samphappalapam pahaya samphappalapa pativirato hoti, abhijjham pahaya anabhijjhalu hoti, byapadapadosam pahaya abyapannacitto hoti, micchaditthim pahaya sammaditthiko hoti.
sn42.13:23.1: Sa kho so, gamani, ariyasavako evam vigatabhijjho vigatabyapado asammulho sampajano patissato mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham, iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati.
sn42.13:23.4: “natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana, sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti”ti.
sn42.13:23.5: Sace tassa bhoto satthuno saccam vacanam, apannakataya mayham, yvaham na kinci byabadhemi tasam va thavaram va?
sn42.13:23.6: Ubhayamettha kataggaho, yam camhi kayena samvuto vacaya samvuto manasa samvuto, yanca kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissami’ti.
